name: Creepy house
description:
24-year-old Anderson Blankernov worked at a construction site, he was attacked by a gang (Satanists) when he went out to dinner. After this incident, he became Paralyzed and now forced to move in a wheelchair. In addition, the hero suffers from depression, panic disorders andaddiction to drugs. His psychologist, Dr. Anerger, comes up with a new method of treatment: Anderson should write down his emotions in the book andIts current mood to overcome the psychological trauma.

P.S. Game ending after you drink water
